p: Regarding the first point we use intact fresh trichomes carefully bursted from Cannabis flowers frozen in liquid nitrogen. Our measurements suggest that imaging of dried trichomes not necessarily reflects their native state since we were able to show that pseudo-morphological structures appear upon drying. Nevertheless, we cannot exclude that the cryofixation of the trichomes performed in this study might lead to the formation of cryo-artefacts, e.g. the damage of cell organelles or subcellular structures like the secretory vesicles of the cavity [ 45]. However, this would not affect our current conclusions.
